result.eng: Do you have enough milk there?
result.ga: An bhfuil bhur ndóthain bainne ansin
result.orig: An bhfuil bhur ndóthain bainne ansin
result.html: An bhfuil bhur ndóthain bainne ansinDo you have enough milk there?
result.ponchtml: An ḃfuil ḃur ndóṫain bainne ansinDo you have enough milk there?

result.eng: Could you warm me a cup of milk?
result.ga: An bhféadfá cupán bainne a théamh dom
result.orig: An bhféadfá cupán bainne a théamh dom
result.html: An bhféadfá cupán bainne a théamh domCould you warm me a cup of milk?
result.ponchtml: An ḃféadfá cupán bainne a ṫéaṁ domCould you warm me a cup of milk?

result.eng: I would like more milk please.
result.ga: Ba mhaith liom níos mó bainne le do thoil
result.orig: Ba mhaith liom níos mó bainne le do thoil
result.html: Ba mhaith liom níos mó bainne le do thoilI would like more milk please.
result.ponchtml: Ba ṁaiṫ liom níos mó bainne le do ṫoilI would like more milk please.

result.eng: Whall I guy a bottle of milk?
result.html: An gceannóidh mé buidéal bainneWhall I guy a bottle of milk?
result.ponchtml: An gceannóiḋ mé buidéal bainneWhall I guy a bottle of milk?

result.html: Crúim na baI milk the cows.
result.ponchtml: Crúim na baI milk the cows.

result.ga: Tae le bainne le do thoil
result.orig: Tae le bainne le do thoil
result.html: Tae le bainne le do thoilTea with milk, please.
result.ponchtml: Tae le bainne le do ṫoilTea with milk, please.

result.eng: Do you need more milk with that?
result.ga: An bhfuil tuilleadh bainne uait leis sin
result.orig: An bhfuil tuilleadh bainne uait leis sin
result.html: An bhfuil tuilleadh bainne uait leis sinDo you need more milk with that?
result.ponchtml: An ḃfuil tuilleaḋ bainne uait leis sinDo you need more milk with that?

result.eng: We need a bottle of milk also, Micí.
result.ga: Tá buidéal bainne uainn freisin a Mhicí
result.orig: Tá buidéal bainne uainn freisin a Mhicí
result.html: Tá buidéal bainne uainn freisin a MhicíWe need a bottle of milk also, Micí.
result.ponchtml: Tá buidéal bainne uainn freisin a ṀicíWe need a bottle of milk also, Micí.

result.eng: The milk is in that refrigerator.
result.ga: Tá an bainne istigh sa gcuisneoir sin
result.orig: Tá an bainne istigh sa gcuisneoir sin
result.html: Tá an bainne istigh sa gcuisneoir sinThe milk is in that refrigerator.
result.ponchtml: Tá an bainne istiġ sa gcuisneoir sinThe milk is in that refrigerator.
